**Required Skills**




  





 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â 8\\+ years of software development experience with a minimum of 4 years as a full\\-time Data Scientist, Machine Learning Researcher, or ML Engineer
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Strong programming skills in Python and R with experience in libraries like Pandas, NumPy, scikit\\-learn
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Hands\\-on experience with deep learning frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Solid understanding of various machine learning techniques (e.g., clustering, decision trees, neural networks)
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Experience in Natural Language Processing (NLP), especially sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and using SpaCy

 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Proven ability to work independently in fast\\-paced, start\\-up\\-like environments

**Specialized AI Skills**




 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Experience deploying and fine\\-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs)
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Knowledge of Reinforcement Learning techniques
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Expertise in Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Experience with audio, video, and image intelligence applications
 



 Â 
 



**Roles \\& Responsibilities**




 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Design, build, deploy, monitor, and maintain machine learning models
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Perform feature engineering to identify and calculate valuable input features
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Clean, analyze, and prepare new data sources for analysis and model input
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Use data visualization tools to communicate insights effectively across teams
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Work with Data Engineers to transition models from research to production
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Optimize model performance using adaptive/incremental ML techniques
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Align customer/product needs with appropriate modeling or visualization approaches
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Recommend and implement solutions to improve data quality and reliability
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Collaborate with the Product Development Team on new feature planning
 








**AI\\-Focused Responsibilities:**




 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Deploy and fine\\-tune LLMs for various business applications
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Apply reinforcement learning in predictive analytics and decision\\-making
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Develop deep learning models for NLP, computer vision, and audio/video analytics
 



 Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Design AI\\-driven solutions targeting audio, video, and image intelligence
 



  





**About Terawe:**




 Terawe is an IT solutions and services firm, based in Bellevue, WA USA, with offices in India, Australia, Canada, and Ireland. We are focused on developing industry\\-wide solutions on cloud infrastructure, productivity, data platforms, and artificial intelligence across multiple verticals such as Retail, Education, Finance, Manufacturing, and Healthcare, and work closely with several enterprise customers globally.
